effect.short: Requires a turn to charge before attacking.  Has a $effect_chance% chance to burn the target.
effect.full: Inflicts regular damage.  Has a 30% chance to burn the target.  User charges for one turn before attacking.

flavorTexts.text:
On the second turn, an ultracold, freezing wind
surrounds the target. This may leave the target with
a burn.
